info.p: The ELLOGON file format is not a single, universally recognized file extension but rather refers to the Data Model used by the Ellogon Language Engineering Platform (a multi-lingual, general-purpose text engineering and annotation environment). Typically, an ELLOGON file describes the linguistic features, like part-of-speech tags or named entities, that have been marked up or extracted from a text within the Ellogon platform.
See here: the formal description of ELLOGON architecture.
